title: And we thought they hated us before
author: VD
content_html:
Can you even imagine how foreign leaders are going to enjoy the Lizard Queen?

Hillary Clinton plans to accept the job of secretary of state offered by Barack Obama, who is reaching out to former rivals to build a broad coalition administration, the Guardian has learned.

On a tangential note, it is utterly unsurprising to learn that McCain is willing to team up with Obama in order to “help to guide through Congress legislation that they both strongly favour.”
content_text:
Can you even imagine how foreign leaders are going to
enjoy the Lizard Queen
?
Hillary Clinton plans to accept the job of secretary of state offered by Barack Obama, who is reaching out to former rivals to build a broad coalition administration, the Guardian has learned.
On a tangential note, it is utterly unsurprising to learn that McCain is willing to team up with Obama in order to “help to guide through Congress legislation that they both strongly favour.”
